description:
Natural Language Processing to Go

spaCy is a free, open-source library for advanced Natural Language Processing (NLP) in Python.
It was specifically designed for production use and it's a great tool to build applications that process text and help  to “understand” large corpuses. 

In this talk I'll present 15 things you should know about Spacy for the better and worse.
title: 15 Things You Should Know About Spacy
